Metadata: Predation by the heterotrophic dinoflagellate "Protoperidiniu​m" cf. "divergens" on copepod eggs and early naupliar stages

Eggs and early naupliar stages of copepods, and possibly other metazoan eggs, could be important prey items for "Protoperidiniu​m" cf. "divergens", which is prey for adult copepods. This study provides a basis for understanding the interactions and a path of recycling carbon between the populations of "Protoperidiniu​m" spp. and copepods, often among the most abundant micro- and macrozooplankto​n.
